function.name: filter_poi_by_regions
function.description: Filter POI IDs from the dataset by specific regions. Optionally filter within a candidate POI ID list.

regions.description: A list of POI regions to filter.

candidate.description: Optional list of candidate POI IDs to further filter the result.

function.name: filter_poi_by_categories
function.description: Filter POI IDs from the dataset by specific categories. Optionally filter within a candidate POI ID list.

categories.description: A list of POI categories to filter.

candidate.description: Optional list of candidate POI IDs to further filter the result.

function.name: sort_by_pid2candidate
function.description: Sort the POIs in the candidate set in ascending order based on their distance to the target POI.

pid.description: The reference POI ID from which distances are calculated.

candidate.description: The candidate POI IDs to be sorted.

function.name: init_candidates
function.description: Initialize candidate set based on user's last visited poi.

function.name: finish
function.description: When the candidate list is less than 10 items Return result and Finish the task.
